remarks: Lemma for subset relationships of projections.  (Contributed by NM, 31-Oct-1999.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
pjidm.1 $e |- H e. CH $.
pjidm.2 $e |- A e. ~H $.
pjsslem.1 $e |- G e. CH $.
pjsslem $p |- ( ( ( projh ` ( _|_ ` H ) ) ` A ) -h ( ( projh ` ( _|_ ` G ) ) ` A ) ) = ( ( ( projh ` G ) ` A ) -h ( ( projh ` H ) ` A ) ) $.
